Nation on edge for next steps as Mueller probe runs its course 
On Friday, Special Counsel Robert Mueller wrapped up his investigation of the Russia scandal, submitting a report to Attorney General William Barr on his findings. Soon after, Barr, who was only… [+1093 chars]
